title: Michael Yo + Thomas Jane (ACS September 14)
itunes:title: Michael Yo + Thomas Jane (ACS September 14)
description:
Comedian Michael Yo joins Adam as actor Thomas Jane comes into the studio to talk about his new movie ‘Dig’ which he stars in with his daughter. They talk about rebranding Bigfoot as Sasquatch, conspiracy theories, TV award shows, ‘The Greaseman’, and a student identifying as a cat. Thomas takes Adam and Michael on a deep dive into aliens before the three make predictions about America’s future.

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

The Jordan Harbinger Show

LectricEBikes.com

Geico.com
